account.settings.account.name: Account Name
account.settings.color.help: Choose a color to distinguish this account in charts and statistics
account.settings.currency.help: Each account must specify a currency. Once set, all transactions for this account will be restricted to this currency
account.settings.currency.warning: Account has transaction records, cannot change currency
account.settings.currency.info: The currency cannot be changed if the account already has transactions. This ensures data consistency.
